body.name: AULA Gaming Keyboard, 104 Keys Gaming Keyboard and Mouse Combo with RGB Backlit, All-Metal Panel, Anti-Ghosting, PC Gaming Keyboard and Mouse, Wired Gaming Keyboard Mouse Combo for MAC Xbox PC Gamers

Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 20 mins
features: Cool RGB Rainbow Backlit: With a RGB backlit keyboard and RGB-breathing backlight mouse, you can customize your keyboard backlight/brightness/speed. There are 2 illumination modes and 3 brightness levels to choose from. ☼: Static backlight/off; FN+☼: Dynamic backlight. Fn+PgUp: Increase brightness; Fn+PgDn: Decrease brightness. FN+ /-: Adjust the speed of dynamic backlight

Quiet & Comfotable Typing: The ergonomic design of this wired keyboard and mouse combo releases your hands from fatigue. 2.0mm keystroke offers fast trigger efficiency and rebound speed, which will bring you a fabulous typing feeling typing experience. All keys offer a soft touch, without loud clicking noises, allowing for late-night typing or gaming without disturbing others

Multimedia & Anti-Ghosting: Elevate your gaming with 12 multimedia combination keys on the top of the pc gaming keyboard (FN+F1~F12) + 4 adjustable DPI ( 1200-2400-4800-7200 ) mouse. With 26 keys offering simultaneous operation without conflict, experience a fast response during gaming

Premium All-Metal Panel: This light up gaming keyboard features a matte metal panel, enhancing both the overall tactile sensation of the keyboard and its durability. The gaming Keyboard is built to withstand the occasional liquid spill, adding to its longevity and tactile sensation

Wide Compatibility: This wired gaming keyboard and mouse combo is your versatile gaming companion. It automatically sleeps after 5 minutes of inactivity, waking up instantly with any keypress. This gaming keyboard and mouse set is compatible with Windows 2000 / 2003 / XP / Vista / Win7 / Win8 / Win10 / Mac / LOS for gaming. Support for PC, Laptop, Google TV, and Smart TV, and Works Well for PS4 / Xbox One

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool , very functional gaming/full keyboard
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice LED lighted gaming and full keyboard. The keystroke is smooth and has a solid mechanical feel. Sooo much better than the button KBs. The LED backlit keys are adjustable in brightness which is a cool feature. The cover is metal, a great feature at this price. The only nit picky thing is the LEDs only have 3 functions for the style/ pattern, a bummer. The mouse has LEDs too, it tracks very well and no lag. I recommend this keyboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and useful keyboard
reviews.reviewText: I don't like the popular shoot-em-up-bang-bang games that most people play, so I can't help you there. I have PTSD from combat in Vietnam and get no pleasure from reliving any of that. I ordered this because I'm old school and love the sound of the keys being struck as well as the beautiful lights around and on the item. I ordered a keyboard like this a few years ago but couldn't get it to work with my iMac. This one has full function although it took a while to figure out some details. I highly recommend it because it makes me smile when I see the colorful glow. The only drawback is the font on the keys. They are hard for me to read occasionally. I'm a good typist but somehow forgot where some of the keys are located due to insufficient memory at this time. Buy it...you'll like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice key response, colorful
reviews.reviewText: Like the feel of the keyboard... like the feel of the mouse... lights are cool if you like that sort of thing. Ergonomics of mouse is comfortable. The phone holder is cool and will add a convenience not on other keyboards. My only issue is a missing key on shipment... I wish I could simply get a key sent to me, but it seems I'll have to get a complete new combo set and return this one. Kind of a pain if they could just send a key instead, but OK. Will comment on customer support after I deal with this issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ok seriously.. this keyboard is amazing
reviews.reviewText: I am BLOWN AWAY by the feel and quality of this keyboard and mouse for such a cheap price. The keys are so satisfying and the lights are greats. Wired so I never have to worry about batteries or lag. Mouse is very precise and has a button to change the sensitivity. The two buttons also are great for WoW since I can bind them to certain spells. Im so glad I didnt spend a ton of money on an expensive keyboard. Plus I dont have to be gentle with it or worry about getting food on it or brekaing it etc bc I can just order another for $20 lol. Def reccommened this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great keyboard
reviews.reviewText: I love this keyboard. From the moment I opened it, I just knew I would love it...I got the grey version, and it looks fabulous. It's not a plastic piece of junk, it's metal and SOLID. Looks beautiful. I've seen better looking keys, color-wise, but this, I think, will stand the test of time. Overall it feels rugged, sturdy, and has great looks. Comes with a phone holder, which is nice, but I am unlikely to use. The mouse is nice too, has breathing colors and a nice design. The best part? The scroll wheel feels so solid when I roll it, I'm sure it will last as long as I need it to. All-in-all highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice keyboard, MIld buyer's remorse
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the latest generation of this keyboard with colorful RGB LED lights and a decent design. It has two brightness levels and can be turned off, which is a nice feature. However, I found that the keys are only illuminated nicely from below, and the actual lettering doesn't help much in recognizing the keys from any angle other than directly above. From any casual angle, the keys are practically illegible.In my experience, this keyboard is not the best option for someone who needs a reliable and functional keyboard. The keys are not very visible, and it's difficult to type on it without looking directly at the keys. I also found that the keyboard is not very durable. Unfortunately, I spilled a small amount of liquid on it, and it no longer functions as a keyboard. The keys got stuck, and it's essentially just a pretty light now.If you're looking for a keyboard with colorful LED lights and a unique design, this keyboard might be worth considering. However,if you need a reliable and functional keyboard for work or gaming, I would recommend looking for other options.On the positive side, the keyboard has an unfinished or industrial, deconstructed look and feel, which is cool and unique. It would be perfect for kids' computers or if used in a proper school desk. The two brightness levels and the ability to turn off the LED lights are also nice features.In conclusion, while the latest generation of this keyboard has some nice features, it's not the best option for someone who needs a reliable and functional keyboard. The keys are not very visible, and it's not very durable. If you're looking for a keyboard with a unique design and colorful LED lights, this keyboard might be a good option. However, if you need a reliable and functional keyboard for work or gaming, I would recommend looking for other options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very very nice KB
reviews.reviewText: This was supposed to be an inexpensive replacement for a spot with low light. the lighted keys are very visible, the action is good, key travel distance is longer than some gaming KBs and that helps not activating unawanted keys. Good for typing, email, work. very comfortable, so far workng ok. I do not care about themes, or moving lights etc, so I don't even know if such features are present or not. I am using this as a lighted KB in a dark area. My older KB was a Dell or something and not lights, I could not see keys, when the light changes, clouds go over and I am trying to save electricity and having lower / less lighting in the room. The mouse is good too, that was just extra, I did not need it but works smooth, size is hefty but still comfortable, and response is good. So far so good. I have another (mechanical) Aula KB also, and that is why I bought the same brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for gaming!!! Easy on the hands!
reviews.reviewText: My son loves this keyboard and mouse. I got it for Christmas and he couldn’t be happier. Keyboard stays lit up in different colors and the mouse could be set to 3 different colors. It’s also easy on the eyes with the lighting. Buttons have no resistance and are easy to control. I was worried about listening to buttons being pressed throughout the day. But they are not loud at all and I’m glad I bought this set. Good quality and decently priced.
Quality of mouse and keyboard are very good
Works well on my desk top pc
U can go o for this price

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice look. Decent Quality Keyboard for Price. For best results disable the light blinking.
reviews.reviewText: Keyboard is comfortable and pleasant to type with. It feels sturdy and has a nice metal look.Keyboard PRO's:-Great look! RGB lights are bright and stylish looking(***when not blinking***) [Fn+Pgup/PgDn Adjusts brightness]-Metal plate gives the keyboard a strong study feel and a great aesthetic look.-Cellphone slot works great and I use it constantly.-Very easy to keep clean!!!-Pleasant soft typing sound(no loud clicks)-Works well. Excellent budget value for the price.Mouse PRO's:-Smooth, responsive.-comfortable size and shape.-Side buttons are handy.-DPI toggle button works well.-Light pattern can be swapped from multi-colour/single-colour/off [SideButton+DP]Keyboard CON's:-Blinking patterns are terrible and look horrendous. [Fn+1 to Disable them]-Only two blinking patterns and they're both awful.-Unlike the cellphone holder, the Penholder is too thin and pens can't stand up in it. They just slide out and fall over. I had to put a bottlecap on the desk under mine so the pens can stay standing.Mouse CON's:-RGB lights on the mouse are even worse. [Can disable with SideButton+DPI]-Only 1 pattern and it looks awful. Just pulses colours on and off in sequence.-Option to select a single colour for the pulsing pattern but it looks just as bad.-No option for solid lights like with the keyboard.-No instructions for special mouse light modes.Overall this is a functional, nice looking, solid value keyboard for the price. I will probably use a different mouse though. One star removed for a lack of better light options but I'm otherwise very happy with mine!
